issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
We're seeing the test fail periodically with:

{quote}java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<2> but was:<1>{quote}

comments.body: Attached is a simple patch that should improve the success rate.

Fair point.  I'll rework the patch.
Here's a new patch using {{waitFor()}}.  It's thoroughly Java 8 code, but I think that should be OK in this case.

Thanks for  [^HDFS-13819.002.patch].
The unit test passed [here|https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/24757/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode/TestDirectoryScanner/].
Just for completeness, do you have any test report where this test failed?

Anyway, this LGTM.
+1

We're not seeing the failure in the upstream test runs.  It's only appearing for us on our internal tests, and only rarely.  But it is the same test code as upstream:

{quote}java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<2> but was:<1>
at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.TestDirectoryScanner.verifyStats(TestDirectoryScanner.java:337)
at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.TestDirectoryScanner.testDirectoryScannerInFederatedCluster(TestDirectoryScanner.java:1074){quote}

I wasn't able to reproduce a failure in 500 runs on my laptop.  This is the problem with these integration tests pretending to be unit tests.  They're inherently flaky, but it takes the right environment.

I'll let it sit for another day and then commit.

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #14772 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/14772/])
HDFS-13819. TestDirectoryScanner#testDirectoryScannerInFederatedCluster (templedf: rev 4a5006b1d08c19ec096b3936541672ad6a225470)
* (edit) hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/server/datanode/TestDirectoryScanner.java
Thanks for the review, [~elgoiri]!  Committed to trunk.
